description: Generate text using a pre-loaded model.

arguments.name: --prompt
arguments.help: The prompt to generate text from.

arguments.name: --user_id
arguments.help: Unique identifier for the user to maintain session memory.

arguments.name: --max_length
arguments.help: The maximum length of the generated text.

arguments.name: --log_level
arguments.help: Set the logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL).

arguments.name: --loop
arguments.help: Run in loop mode for interactive text generation.
